bugs.steps:
1. Go to the login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click on the Sign-in button
bugs.actual_result: Nothing happens when clicking the Sign-in button
bugs.expected_result: User should be signed in successfully

bugs.steps:
1. Go to the Forgot Password page
2. Enter a valid email
3. Click Submit
bugs.expected_result: A password reset email should be sent
